videos.title: Earth Can’t be Old – Answering the Critics
videos.description:
📕 Get a FREE copy of our _Creation Answer Book_ here: https://creation.com/24cab
It is one of our most recommended resources, and includes chapters on dating methods (ch. 4), dinosaurs (ch. 19), and much more!

---

Why do biblical creationists insist that the earth is ‘young’? Hasn't science _proven_ that it is millions/billions of years old?

Where does the ‘6,000 years old’ figure come from, anyway—and is the methodology used to get that figure defensible? What did the church fathers believe? And for Christians, isn’t this whole topic just a massive distraction from the ‘real’ issues of the Gospel?

Join Dr Mark Harwood for an engaging discussion in which he responds to some of the challenges skeptics have posed following his previous, highly popular, video on the age of the earth (https://youtu.be/zSGGnx2dT3k).

⏳ TIMESTAMPS
00:00 Teaser
00:40 *Introduction:* Why believe that the earth can’t be old?
01:38 Why ‘historical science’ is different from ‘experimental science’
04:05 Historical science is subject to the investigator's preconceptions about history
05:09 In matters of history, the historical method trumps the scientific method
07:17 The myth of neutrality: Even scientists have presuppositions
08:52 Uniformitarianism: Is ‘the present the key to the past’?
10:19 How does the Bible give 6,000 years?
11:45 *Challenge:* “You can't use the Bible’s chronogenealogies—they use rounding”
14:07 *Challenge:* “The early church fathers didn’t believe the earth was young”
14:52 *Challenge:* “The age of the earth doesn't matter; it’s a distracting side issue for Christians"
16:04 → An old earth undercuts the logical consistency of the Gospel
19:42 → An old earth undercuts the character of God
20:12 → An old earth undercuts the inerrancy of Scripture
21:11 → An old earth undercuts the Bible’s explanation for death and suffering
25:02 → Summary: It _does_ matter!
26:14 *Challenge:* "Geology proves millions of years, via sedimentary layers and radiometric dating"
26:49 → Sedimentary layers are not consistent with ‘millions of years’ conclusions
28:43 → Fossils in sedimentary rock show the layers were laid down rapidly
29:43 → Millions of years can't be found _between_ the sedimentary layers, either
31:17 → Summary: There’s no ‘millions of years’ in the rocks at all!
32:22 → Case study: Rapid sedimentation at Mount St Helens
33:41 → Case study: Radiometric dating at Mount St Helens
37:01 → Radiometric dating does not (and cannot!) provide ‘absolute dates’
38:51 *Challenge:* “Population growth estimates don’t support biblical creation”
42:52 *Challenge:* “Soft tissue in dino bones is satisfactorily explained by the presence of iron”
44:55 → How long can DNA be preserved?
47:10 *Challenge:* “Carbon-14 in dinosaur bones is not a problem for millions of years”
49:03 *Conclusion:* The biblical account makes so much more sense of real-world observations!
50:38 Where to get more info: creation.com

videos.title: Why the Creation-Evolution Issue is so Important!
videos.description:
📕 Get your free copy of _The Creation Answer Book_ here: https://creation.com/25cab
It is one of our most recommended resources.

Should Christians bother with the biblical account of origins and the creation/evolution debate? Isn’t it just a distraction from more important biblical matters—like the Gospel?

In this interview, creation apologist and speaker, Scott Gillis, explains why the origins debate matters for Christians—and for everyone. It is _not_ just a side issue! And failure to answer people's questions in this area impacts their openness to the Gospel! Find out why!

⏳ TIMESTAMPS
00:00 Teaser
00:54 Introduction: Why should Christians care about origins?

03:28 Challenge: Religion is ‘fairy tale’, but science deals with ‘facts’
05:00 Illustration: The Lifeguard

08:29 The Bible makes some scientific statements; evolution directly contradicts them
09:49 When young people don’t get answers, many leave the faith
11:02 Evidence for the Biblical Flood: Grand Canyon and Mount St Helens
11:57 → Extensive sedimentary layers (with fossils) all over the earth
12:44 → Enough water to cover the whole earth
13:44 → Fossilized marine creatures on Mt Everest
14:11 → Rapid sedimentation at Mount St Helens
15:31 → Rapid canyon-carving at Mount St Helens
16:16 → Examples of rapid fossilization
19:40 Can we fit millions of years of evolution into the Bible without upsetting major biblical doctrines?
20:16 → Millions of years don’t fit after Adam; that contradicts the Bible’s many time references
21:41 → Millions of years don’t fit before Adam; that contradicts the Bible’s critical teaching on death
23:28 → Why the Bible’s teaching on death is so important
24:58 Martin Luther: Have the humility to believe that the Holy Spirit got the creation account correct
25:58 Bruce Willis: Science has invalidated the Bible!
27:22 → Christians need to be equipped to defend their faith against such claims—usually about origins
27:58 So, is ‘origins’ a salvation issue?
28:22 → No; salvation is through FAITH IN CHRIST
25:44 → Yes; millions have been told science invalidates the Bible; their salvation is at stake
29:10 Conclusion: The importance of being equipped to defend and share our faith
31:30 Equip yourself with answers: Get The Creation Answers Book (e-book) for FREE!

videos.title: Why Evolution Can't Explain Morality
videos.description:
📕 Get your free copy of _The Creation Answer Book_ here: https://creation.com/26cab
It is one of our most recommended resources.

There are many different ways to logically show that God must exist. One approach is called the ‘moral argument’. It shows that objective morals (i.e. moral standards that are not derived from human beings, but stand _above_ them) clearly exist, and that God is the only reasonable explanation for them.

Join apologist and speaker, Keaton Halley, to find out why!

⏳ TIMESTAMPS
00:00 Teaser
00:37 Introduction: Do we need God in order to explain morality? Or can evolution explain it?

02:12 → Objective morality
03:34 → Subjective (or ‘relative’) morality
04:32 Is there evidence that objective morality even exists?
05:46 Do differences in conscience prove that morality is relative?
06:16 → The fact that people disagree doesn’t mean there is no truth!
07:04 → The Nazis were _objectively_ wrong!
08:06 Can evolution explain objective morality?

09:34 Continuing: Can evolution explain objective morality?
10:36 → No, evolutionary explanations only produce _subjective_ morality!
12:25 Is morality just a social contract?
14:01 Is God really the best explanation for objective morality?
15:50 Atheist’s challenge: Where did God get _His_ moral standard from?
16:13 → This is just a rehash of Euthyphro’s Dilemma (from Plato)
17:11 → It’s a false dilemma
18:29 → Answer: Moral goodness is rooted in the very character/nature of God
19:07 What about the presence of evil?
19:51 → Moral evil depends on objective moral _goodness_ for it's existence!
21:57 → Even ‘natural evil’ points to the existence of a perfect standard of goodness!

25:58 Conclusion: Why objective morality is best explained by God

videos.title: Why Darwinism is Not a Testable Scientific Theory
videos.description:
🎬 Get FREE access to the award-winning documentary Evolution’s Achilles’ Heels here: https://creation.com/27eah

---

There is an often-repeated assertion that evolution is scientific fact, while the Bible’s account of creation is mere religious stories or myths. However, it might be surprising to learn that there is some ‘storytelling’ included in the paradigm of evolution.  

You see, scientists from the evolutionary and creation paradigm both start from a particular worldview.  And the worldview drives their interpretation of the facts. An evolutionary bias results in a natural focus on their presumption which leads to interpretations that ignore scientific evidence that supports biblical creation.  

In this discussion you will learn how the very nature of real science gives us a better understanding of why scientists come to very opposing conclusions. You’ll also get a taste of some simple scientific facts that stand in complete opposition to that idea that evolution is a scientific fact. You see, believing the Bible is not a ‘blind faith’.

videos.title: Science Wouldn’t Exist Without Christianity
videos.description:
Science requires many assumptions to work. A major one is an orderly universe. But an orderly universe doesn’t follow from an atheistic or pagan worldview. It does follow from the biblical teaching of a divine Lawmaker who is a God of order. Science first flourished in Medieval Europe thanks to the rise of the university and theologian–natural-philosopher class. The Reformation brought Christians back to objective understanding of Scripture, which was transferred to understanding nature.  
 
Later scientists like Francis Bacon were motivated by trying to recapture the knowledge they thought Adam had before his Fall. Many atheists have made false claims about Christians believing in a flat earth, opposing childbirth pain relief, and totally misrepresenting the Galileo controversy. 

Join us as we discuss the Christian origins of real science.

04:05 What did the early scientists believe?

videos.title: Why Life Couldn’t Have Evolved from Non-Living Chemicals
videos.description:
🎬 Get FREE access to the award-winning documentary _Evolution’s Achilles’ Heels_ here: https://creation.com/30eah

---

Atheists must believe that living creatures evolved from non-living chemicals, via a process commonly called chemical evolution (aka abiogenesis). But real scientific laws, especially of chemistry and information theory, refute this. Chemical processes go in the opposite direction required.  

For example, life needs exclusively ‘one-handed’ molecules, while random chemistry produces an equal mix of left and right handed molecules. Also, little molecules in water don’t combine to form the needed big molecules; rather any big molecules break down to little molecules.  

Yet another problem is the wrong kinds of reactions, which chemical evolutionists avoid by buying pure reactants. Chemical evolutionists also can’t explain the encyclopedic information content needed for enzymes, DNA, and molecular machines essential for life. 

Join physical chemist Dr Jonathan Sarfati for a discussion of the building blocks of life, and how everything we know about chemistry argues against the imagined chemical start to evolution.

Most people have been told that evolution is good, observable science.

But industrial chemist, Dr Stephen Grocott, says evolution is actually based on a series of ‘once a upon a time’ stories—and that even most _scientists_ don’t realize that evolution is not, in fact, _observable science._

These are bold claims! But are they defensible? Join us as Dr Grocott (himself a former evolutionist) explains _why_ he believes evolution is a fairytale—and provides some fascinating supporting evidence!

videos.title: Why the Human Body Did NOT Evolve
videos.description:
📩 To subscribe to our email newsletter, _Creation INFObytes_ (mentioned at the end of the video), visit: https://creation.com/40infobytes

---

For years, medical doctor / psychiatrist, Dr Dianne Grocott, never questioned evolution. But when evidence was presented to her that contradicted the billions-of-years-of-evolution narrative, she was left asking, "Why wasn't I told this?!"

Her own training in medicine enabled her to clearly see how features of the human body which she had previously been told were amazing outcomes of evolution, are in fact products of incredible design and goal-oriented planning. In fact, it is inconceivable that processes such as the blood clotting system, or birth, could have been cobbled together over numerous iterations of trial-and-error. No organism would have survived such experimentation with its vital, complex, interconnected biological systems!

The human body simply did NOT evolve! Join Dr Grocott to find out (just SOME of the reasons) why!

If Darwin was alive today, knowing what we know about living things, would he still be an Evolutionist? Charles Darwin’s theories changed what the world believes about biological naturalism. His contributions to science are legendary, yet he knew nothing about the complexity of living things.

Everybody knows that the New Testament is really important to Christians. But what about the Old Testament? Does it have value to bring, too?

Many people think of the Old Testament as a confusing mix of mythology, ancient Jewish laws, and poetry—all presided over by an angry, hard-to-please god. Are they right? Is the Old Testament, well, OLD, outdated, and irrelevant?

No! The Old Testament is much more than that, as Rev. Peter Howe explains. In fact, it is utterly indispensable to the New Testament and to a true Christian worldview. It was the Bible that Jesus read. It is even the source of many of the foundational values that Western society is built on!

---

For nearly a century it has been claimed that mutations are the engine that drives evolution, bringing new traits and information to the genome.

And yet, the more we have learned about mutations, the more they have been shown for what they really are: A _destructive_ force, rather than a creative one—responsible for hundreds of thousands of different diseases in humans alone!

Even when mutations produce ‘beneficial’ changes (for example, bacteria developing resistance to antibiotics), a closer examination nevertheless reveals that mutations have _broken_ something existing, rather than creating something new.

Mutations aren’t the engine of evolution. _They are its end._

Join plant biologist Dr Don Batten for a revealing exploration of the _true_ power of mutations.

videos.title: Why God is the Best Explanation for Rationality
videos.description:
🤝 To support Creation Talk and this ministry visit: https://creation.com/smvp-donate

---

What worldview best explains the human capacity to think and make rational inferences? According to the ‘argument from reason’, this is strong evidence for the existence of God, especially the Creator God of the Bible. If humans were created in God’s image and God designed our minds, it is unsurprising that they work and can perform impressive feats. But if atheism is true and humans are merely accidental byproducts of evolution, what is the likelihood such a blind process would produce creatures who can reason properly?

To delve more deeply into this topic, Dawn Blount interviews Keaton Halley, an apologist with Creation Ministries International. They discuss rationality, consciousness, natural selection, randomness, and evidence for the soul. At the end of the day, it’s clear that reason requires God. As C.S. Lewis once noted, the human ability to think and reason is the “cardinal difficulty with naturalism”.

videos.title: Myths, Lies, and Half-Truths About Church History
videos.description:
📙 Get your copy of _Christianity for Skeptics_ (recommended at the end) here: https://creation.com/36cfs

---

Many commonly held views about the church’s role in history are based on myths, exaggerations, or falsehoods. Topics such as the church teaching a flat earth, Galileo’s dispute with the church, Hypatia’s murder, the ‘Dark Ages’, and the church’s stance on anesthesia have been misrepresented over time. For example, most scholars throughout church history knew the earth was round, Galileo’s conflict was as much about politics as science, Hypatia had Christian students and admirers, no historian uses the term ‘Dark Ages’ because the Middle Ages were a period of great innovation, and no Christian of note opposed anesthesia.

Later in the conversation, Dr Jonathan Sarfati explores deeper issues. For example, is religion is the cause of wars, the Crusades, and Inquisition. In reality, atheistic regimes of the 20th century caused far more deaths than religious conflicts, e.g. Stalin’s Holodomor, Mao’s Great Leap Forward, and Pol Pot’s killing fields. He highlights that Christianity has been responsible for significant moral progress, such as the abolition of slavery, driven by the belief that all people are made in God’s Image.

videos.title: Why Radiometric Dating Fails: A Creationist’s Perspective
videos.description:
📕 Get your FREE copy of _The Creation Answer Book_ here: https://creation.com/47Bcab It is one of our most recommended resources. Chapter 4 deals with dating methods and the age of the earth.

---

Radiometric dating is often presented as indisputable proof that the earth is old. The knockout punch to any young-Earth ideas. The evidence to end all argument.

"How do we _know_ the earth is old?", we are asked?
"Because of radiometric dating, that's how! Because scientists _measured_ stuff [i.e. via radiometric dating], so _science says_ its old."

But _does it really?_ How does radiometric dating even work? Is it, as the general public has been led to believe, some sort of ‘purely scientific’ method that is completely free from assumptions and any bias on the scientists’ part?

Or is it, in fact, _deeply flawed_—repeatedly shown to be unreliable when used on samples of _known_ age?

Discover the surprising truth about radiometric dating in this helpful discussion with Dr Mark Harwood.

⏳ CHAPTERS
00:00 Teaser

07:24 The underlying assumptions are atheistic—and inevitably require millions of years
09:26 A Christian’s underlying assumptions are the opposite!
10:10 True calibration requires samples of known age
11:48 Case studies: Radiometric dating is wrong on volcanic rocks of known age! 
14:59 Billions-of-years dating processes aren't appropriate if the world is only thousands of years old
16:16 Case study: The KBS Tuff shows that scientists’ _beliefs_ are the most important factor!
20:48 Case studies: Dating methods often contradict each other!
24:53 The public aren’t told about the discrepancies and the underlying beliefs
25:50 The stakes are high: If millions of years are true, then the Bible’s credibility is lost
27:28 The _true_ history of the world, as recorded in the Bible
30:18 Where to find out more

videos.title: 5 Failed Predictions of Evolution
videos.description:
🎬 Get FREE access to the award-winning documentary _Evolution’s Achilles’ Heels,_ here: https://creation.com/48eah

📃 Read the full article, _40 failed predictions of Evolution,_ here:
https://creation.com/evolution-40-failed-predictions

---

For a theory to be correct, its predictions must come true—its expectations must turn out to be accurate. (Note, though, that this, alone, isn't enough to _prove_ a theory.)

But when a theory repeatedly makes predictions that turn out to be wildly at odds with reality, it shows that the theory is _completely wrong, and should be dropped immediately._

Which of these two categories does evolutionary theory (in all its many forms—cosmological, geological, biological, etc.) fall in?

What about biblical creation?

The answers to these questions will come as a surprise to many!

Join plant biologist, Dr Don Batten, for a look at _just some_ of the ways in which evolutionary theory has predicted the _exact opposite_ of what reality would eventually reveal—while biblical creationist predictions have been shown to be remarkably accurate!

⏳ CHAPTERS

15:37 *Accurate predictions and expectations from biblical creationists*
16:52 → Human DNA should be mostly functional

17:55 → Diamonds should contain carbon-14
18:22 → Coal samples from across the world should contain carbon-14—at similar levels

---

Exploring the tension between biblical and secular history, this discussion delves into complex questions—Is the Earth thousands or billions of years old? What do genealogies reveal about the Bible’s timeline, and how do we reconcile this with the dates proposed by modern science? The conversation also touches on ancient Egyptian history, carbon dating, and why these topics shape our understanding of humanity’s origins and our place in history. 

Beyond these scientific and historical analyses lies a more profound question: why does any of it matter? With insights drawn from Scripture, the discussion unveils how beliefs about creation and the Fall directly influence the purpose and message of redemption. These foundational elements connect directly to the role of Jesus, the “last Adam,” who reconciles creation to God. Dr. Rob Carter weaves together science, theology, and personal experience, illustrating how a firm biblical foundation can transform both understanding and faith.

Genetic engineering offers remarkable possibilities but raises significant ethical questions. Is it right to alter DNA to repair defects or improve crops? What about using genetic modifications to regrow human limbs? These advancements come with the potential for unintended consequences, requiring wisdom and moral clarity. How can Christians discern boundaries in a world where technology’s reach seems limitless?

Dr Rob Carter examines genetic engineering through three guiding principles: respecting humans as bearers of God’s image, stewarding creation responsibly, and following Christ’s example of healing and restoration. He explores applications ranging from medical breakthroughs to ethical dilemmas in IVF and cloning. Rob provides a thoughtful, faith-based perspective on these complex issues.

---

Most of us have been told—as scientific fact—that our solar system formed by itself from a swirling disc of dust and gas about 4.5 billion years ago.

However, this story (about the distant, unobserved past) is actually just a _hypothesis_ that rests on an array of unprovable assumptions. The most central of these is the belief that everything can (and must) be explained _without reference to God._ But is that assumption _reasonable?_ How well does it fit with the observations?

The truth is that the physical evidence we observe in our solar system contradicts the evolutionary story—on _many_ counts.

Join Dr Mark Harwood—who played a key role in the development of Australia’s national satellite system—for a fascinating and enlightening look at just _some_ of the evidence that points to a young age for our solar system. Also, find out why any of this even matters!

In this insightful conversation, the power of forgiveness is explored as a key to resolving conflicts. Jeff Benjamin delves into the challenges of reconciliation, emphasizing that avoiding conflict only builds tension over time. Instead, he advocates for facing issues head-on through forgiveness, even before receiving an apology, as a way to foster healthier relationships. 

Forgiveness, Jeff explains, isn’t only for others; it frees us from bitterness and allows for peace. He shares how this principle aligns with biblical teachings and offers practical applications for workplace and personal relationships, encouraging listeners to rethink how they handle offenses, big and small.

---

If you’ve heard of ice core dating, chances are you imagine some sort of precise, scientific dating method involving counting layers in ice samples—kind of like counting tree rings in trees. And you’d be _partly_ right.

But is ice core dating reliable? How does it work, anyway? Is it an _objective_ dating method, or does it rely on assumptions? If assumptions are involved, does everybody _agree_ on those assumptions? And how does ice core dating relate to the Bible’s account of history?

Join geologist, Dr Tas Walker, for a fascinating exploration of ice core dating and its relation to origins, worldview, and even the meaning of life!

videos.description:

---

Most people believe that the existence of natural selection proves evolution. They believe that random mutations produce changes in the genetic code of organisms, causing change over time; natural selection then removes unfavorable traits from the population. 

In reality, natural selection is the exact opposite of evolution. In this interview, we’ll explore the real origins of species, the logic behind natural selection, and how organisms’ genetic code responds to their environments. 

⏳ TIMESTAMPS
00:00 Teaser

Uncover the mysteries of Joshua’s conquest of Canaan as we explore how archaeology aligns—or seems to conflict—with biblical history. Why do some scholars doubt the historicity of Jericho’s fallen walls, and does evidence like carbon dating and ancient pottery truly challenge the biblical account? Dive into the details of Jericho, Ai, and Hazor, examining the ruins, burn layers, and cultural artifacts.

Keaton Halley discusses how assumptions, biases, and academic trends influence interpretations of the evidence. From collapsed walls to clay tablets bearing clues about ancient Israel, discover how archaeology offers a lens to view the Bible’s reliability and the faith it inspires.

videos.title: What the Government is Not Telling You About UFOs
videos.description:
🎬 Get FREE access to the award-winning documentary _Alien Intrusion: Unmasking a Deception_ here: https://creation.com/67ai

📖 To subscribe to _Creation_ magazine visit: https://creation.com/67cm

---

Reports of UFOs, or Unidentified Aerial Phenomena (UAPs), have captured attention for decades. While most can be explained naturally, there are many that defy the laws of physics and challenge natural explanations—leading to deeper questions about their nature and origin.

Could they be extraterrestrial? Or do they point to an interdimensional, or even _spiritual_ reality?

What have government investigations concluded? Have they been hiding information from the public—and if so, why? (Could it be that they have been hiding just how _little_ they know, rather than how _much_ they know?)

Gary Bates, a leading Christian researcher, shows how historical records, government reports, and modern testimonies, all reveal a complex pattern of deception that mirrors biblical warnings about the spiritual realm. He explains how these entities have changed their appearance over time to fit with cultural and technological trends, and how invoking the name of Jesus halts so-called alien abductions! Drawing on decades of research, Gary provides meaningful answers that not only make sense of the evidence, but also align strikingly with the Bible.

videos.title: Why God Couldn't Have Taken Millions of Years to Create
videos.description:
Can Christians reconcile millions of years with the Bible? While some argue God could have used such vast periods to create, this idea raises theological challenges. Death and suffering in the fossil record contradict the Bible’s teaching of a perfect creation before the Fall. The question becomes one of authority: do we trust Scripture’s clear account, or reinterpret it to fit modern scientific claims?

The origins of the millions-of-years concept trace back to early geology, but Scott Gillis highlights how this view undermines foundational doctrines like the Gospel and the justice of God. By standing on the authority of Scripture, he shows how the evidence—biological complexity and the global flood—supports the Bible’s account of creation, affirming a miraculous and trustworthy Creator.

📘 Get a FREE copy of _Refuting Compromise_ here: https://creation.com/56rc

📖 To subscribe to _Creation_ magazine (mentioned at the end of the video) visit: https://creation.com/56cm

videos.title: 22 Facts You Didn’t Know About Noah’s Ark
videos.description:
📕 Get your FREE copy of _The Creation Answer Book_ here: https://creation.com/68cab It is one of our most recommended resources. There are several chapters dealing with Noah’s Ark and the Flood.

🎤 Book a creation speaker at _your_ gathering: https://creation.com/events/book

---

These days, the story of Noah and the Ark is often depicted as a quaint children’s tale. Yet for millennia people considered it to be genuine history—a true account of the most catastrophic event the world has ever known.

What if they’re right? Is the biblical account even feasible? Were ancient people capable of building a vessel of that size—and if so, would it have even been seaworthy? Could the necessary animals, food, and water have fitted on board? How could they have repopulated the earth afterward? And critically, what about the physical evidence a global Flood would have left behind?

Rod Walsh has spent decades defending the biblical Flood account—and has even built several incredible scale models of the Ark. Join him for an illuminating discussion of the feasibility of—and evidence for—the biblical account of Noah’s Flood.

⏳ CHAPTERS
00:00 Teaser
00:39 Introduction: Meet the ‘Ark man’, Rod Walsh
03:54 Q1: Why did God send a global flood?
05:34 Q2: Did Noah have the technology to build a massive ship?

15:06 Q5: How did Noah cut the wood to build the Ark?
16:19 Q6: How did Noah steer the Ark?

18:33 Q8: How many animals went on the Ark?
22:11 Q9: How did Noah deal with all the animal mess?
23:12 Q10: How did Noah collect all the animals?
23:36 Q11: What was the effect of the Flood on the earth?
26:00 Q12: Why is there virtually no erosion between geologic layers said to be separated by millions of years, given rapid erosion rates today?
30:33 Q13 & 14: How does the Grand Canyon point to Noah’s Flood? Does Mount St Helens cast any light on this?
32:14 Q15: Might the biblical Flood have been a local, rather than a global, event?
35:37 Q16: Where did all the floodwater go?
37:24 Q17: What happened after Noah and his family left the Ark?
38:29 Q18: How did all the different people groups arise after the Flood?
40:08 Q19: Is there any other clear evidence for a worldwide flood? (Fossils!)
43:59 Q20: Did dinosaurs go on the Ark?

51:08 Q22: Is Noah’s Ark still out there somewhere?

videos.title: Geologist Explains Why Most Scientists Get Earth’s Age WRONG
videos.description:
📕 Get your FREE copy of _The Creation Answer Book_ here: https://creation.com/69cab It is one of our most recommended resources.

🤝 To support _Creation Talk_ and this ministry visit: https://creation.com/69donate

---

People today are taught that the earth is 4.5 billion years old, and that this is a firmly-established scientific fact.

But over time, society has had quite different ideas about the age of the earth.

So where did that number (4.5 billion years) come from? Is it as firmly rooted in the scientific method as people have been led to believe? And is it actually _correct?_

Join geologist Dr Tas Walker for an insightful discussion of the history of the age of the earth. Learn how it has changed (drastically!) over time, and what drove the change. Most importantly, discover why the age of the earth even matters to the lives of everyday people.

⏳ CHAPTERS
00:00 Teaser
00:50 Introduction: How can so many people be wrong about the age of the earth?
01:44 The scientific method: How time/age is measured
06:45 The 4.5-billion-year date for the earth is not based on science!
07:44 The claimed age of the earth has changed as people’s underlying _beliefs_ have changed
09:17 What is science? The necessity of _observations_
10:46 The _composition_ of the geologic column is based on _observations_
12:33 The _dates_ on the geologic column are based on _philosophy_
15:54 → Up to the 1700s: People believed Earth was less than 6,000 years old
16:11 → Late 1700s: James Hutton proposed uniformitarianism
18:35 There’s been a huge change in the culture’s belief about the age of the earth!
21:32 Naturalism (a sort of atheism!) was the underlying belief that drove the changing age
25:32 → Late 1800s: Lord Kelvin used thermodynamics to proposed an age of 20-40 million years
31:02 → 1896: Radioactivity was discovered
33:05 → 1911–1946: Arthur Holmes used radiometric dating to repeatedly increase Earth’s age
36:31 → 1956: Clair Patterson used lead isotope measurements to propose an age of 4.55 billion years
39:16 The age hasn’t changed since 1956. Why?
42:24 The story about Earth history has continued to change, even though the age hasn’t!
44:30 Is life meaningless? Why Earth’s origins matter
50:18 Where to find out more

videos.title: Does the Bible Teach Bogus Science?
videos.description:
Can the Bible be trusted when it describes the natural world? Some claim it reflects primitive cosmology, portraying a solid dome sky with stars embedded within it and waters above. If true, this would challenge the Bible’s reliability. But what do the Bible’s own words reveal?

Explore how terms like “firmament” and descriptions of heavenly waters are understood in their original context. Is the Bible mistaken about science, or does it use poetic and observational language common in human expression? Keaton Halley delves into these questions, addressing claims about solid skies, heavenly oceans, and the movement of stars.

By examining ancient Near Eastern texts and biblical language, Halley demonstrates why Scripture’s authority remains intact. He highlights the significance of interpreting the Bible within its context and trusting its claims about both the natural and spiritual realms.

videos.title: Mind-Blowing Nanobots in All Living Cells!
videos.description:
Did you know that even the ‘simplest’ life forms are jam-packed with biological ‘nanobots’?

From DNA detanglers to rotary and linear motors—these molecular machines are _absolutely fundamental_ to life. If molecular machines didn’t exist, life wouldn’t exist.

So, given that evolution is widely taught as ‘fact’, presumably the origin of these nanomachines can be explained in terms of step-by-step evolutionary processes—right?

Not at all! As plant biologist, Dr Don Batten, explains, biological nanobots clearly point to intelligent design. And that’s not a religious conclusion—it’s simply what the evidence indicates!

videos.title: Evolution Is Wrong About the Grand Canyon
videos.description:
The Grand Canyon often evokes a narrative of ancient history spanning millions of years, but is there an alternative explanation that aligns with the Bible’s historical account? From sedimentary layers to fossil arrangements, what if the evidence pointed to a catastrophic worldwide flood instead of slow geological processes? Explore the connections between geological and biological evolution, questioning assumptions like radiometric dating and the implications of bent rock layers that seem to defy conventional explanations.

Scott Gillis invites us to reconsider widely accepted interpretations of Earth’s history, proposing that the Grand Canyon is not a monument to time but a scar from God’s judgment during Noah’s Flood. Unfold the evidence that he believes not only supports the Bible’s truth but also challenges evolutionary timelines, pointing to a Creator who shaped, judged, and seeks to redeem the world.

---

videos.title: If Evolution is True, the New Heavens & Earth Will be Awful!
videos.description:
The Bible speaks of a New Heavens and Earth. But what will it be like? Will it be some sort of ethereal, spirit-like existence? Or will it be physical?

And how do a person’s beliefs about Genesis and origins—for example, belief in evolution and long ages—impact their beliefs about the coming New Creation?

Join Gary Bates for a fascinating—and Gospel-centered—discussion of the New Heavens and Earth. Gary compellingly argues that _physical resurrection_ is not only a basic Gospel truth, but that a _physical New Creation_ is the only kind that could suitably restore what was physically lost in the original Creation due to the Fall. He also shows how belief in millions of years of evolution, death, and suffering before Adam sinned is both unnecessary, and ultimately _incompatible_ with the Bible’s big picture of Creation → Fall → Restoration.

---

🎬 Get FREE access to _Creation Restored_ here: https://creation.com/71cr

🎤 Book a creation speaker at _your_ gathering: https://creation.com/events/book

---

32:30 Warning: There is a coming judgement before the Restoration!

videos.title: Creationist Debunks 5 Common Atheist Arguments
videos.description:
Many Christians find themselves unsure how to respond when confronted with common atheist arguments. In this episode, apologist Keaton Halley addresses five frequently encountered challenges: Who created God? Aren’t Christians atheists regarding other gods? Can God make a rock too heavy to lift? Would you believe differently if raised elsewhere? And is God just filling gaps in scientific knowledge?

Keaton exposes the fundamental logical flaws in each argument while providing Christians with confident, reasoned responses. Drawing from his background in apologetics, he demonstrates how these challenges fail to undermine Christianity, and explains why evidence from science and philosophy actually points toward God’s existence rather than away from it.

---

🎬 Get FREE access to _Refuting the New Atheists_ here: https://creation.com/60rna

🤝 To support _Creation Talk_ and this ministry visit: https://creation.com/60donate

---

⏳ CHAPTERS
00:00 Teaser
00:49 Introduction: Five common atheist arguments
03:32 Keaton’s own faith journey
05:11 Evidence for God’s existence
09:17 *Argument 1:* “Who created God?”
14:07 *Argument 2:* “Christians are atheists with respect to other gods!”
17:13 *Argument 3:* “Can God make a rock too heavy for himself to lift?”
19:39 *Argument 4:* “If you were raised in a different religion, you’d think THAT was right!”
24:20 *Argument 5:* “Belief in God relies on ignorance; science has the answers!”
27:15 How to address OTHER arguments
30:58 Where to get more information

videos.title: How to Talk to Strangers About Christ
videos.description:
For many Christians, the idea of talking to other people about our faith is very daunting.

One reason for this is that we tend to have quite unrealistic—and imposing—mental pictures of what “witnessing” conversations should look like. But it doesn’t have to be that hard!

So, how do we get past our own unhelpful stereotypes of evangelism, to being able to have simple, unforced conversations about spiritual things—when the opportunity arises? (And opportunities arise more frequently than most people realize!)

Dr Tas Walker has been sharing his faith for decades, and in this episode, he shares a number of very practical tips and examples to help you share your faith too!

---

🎁 Get FREE unlimited streaming access to our digital resource _Creation Evangelism in a Secular World_ when you subscribe to _Creation_ magazine using the discount code SMVP72CM. Simply enter the code at checkout: https://creation.com/72cm

📚 Get _Creation_ magazine back issues here: https://creation.com/72cm-bak

📇 Get creation.com witnessing cards here: https://creation.com/72web-card

---

videos.title: What Men in ‘God’s Image’ Look Like
videos.description:
What does it mean to be a man? Society offers conflicting answers, from outdated stereotypes to extremes of dominance or passivity. But what does the Bible say? Masculinity is more than appearances or achievements—it’s about integrity, humility, and servant leadership. A real man leads with compassion, exercises self-control, and strives to reflect the character of God.

Scripture shows us flawed men—David, Moses, Gideon—who still pursued righteousness. It’s a call to resilience, repentance, and faith. Jeff Benjamin shares how these timeless principles challenge and inspire men to live as God intended.

---

📩 To subscribe to our email newsletter, _Creation INFObytes_ (mentioned at the end of the video), visit: https://creation.com/61infobytes

🎤 Book a creation speaker at _your_ gathering: https://creation.com/events/book
